Memorial for my old sights

Schindibee's fictional sight for Semovente Breda 501

#customsight #sight #fictional #breda501 #breda_501

This is a fully fictional sight for the Italian Breda 501 Tank Destroyer, based on the funnel-type "Anax" sight I have created for a few vehicles already.

The sight features quick-use features like main graduation, ranging funnel and deflection aiming aids for the improved APCBC ammo and distance scales for the weaker default APCBC and HE ammos.

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder \War Thunder\.

2) Go to test Drive (reccommended anyway to try o

Schindibee's fictional sight for VersuchsFlakWagen (VFW)

#customsight #sight #fictional #vfw #versuchsflakwagen

This is a fully fictional sight for the VFW, based on the funnel-type "Anax" sight I have created for a few vehicles already.

Or as the Germans might have called it, the FortschMZwPzFlzBekVZGStadEntfBest(VFW) ("Fortschrittliches Mehrzweck Panzer- und Flugzeug-Bekämpfungs Versuchs-Zielgerät mit Stadiametrischer Entfernungsbestimmung für Versuchs Flak Wagen"; English translation: "Sight")...

german and english version

update 1:
i changed the filenames - it works now
#2s6_tunguska #2s6 #tunguska #sight #toptier #spaa

Minimalistic arcade sight, from which I removed all unnecessary for the arcade (and maybe someone in realistic like it)

Additional
The sight is available in 3 versions with scales up to 1.2 km (S), 2.8 km (M), 6 km (L).

Installation


  1. Download archive to any folder
  2. Pull out the sights (.blk) to the folder with the scopes need the tank, in the folder "UserSights" in the root folder of the game (if not, then create with same name) (if the folder "UserSights" no need a folder with the sights of the tank, then the actions described in item 4, with one exception, select the item "Add a grid sight",

Sight for ZSU-57-2 for a view from the gunner with marks of a trajectory for two guns (at a distance to 100 meters inclusive)

Additionally

  • Also suggest to read the article "the Calculation of distance (ru)".
  • "FG_P" in sight-name is "From Gunner _ Points"

Installation

  1. Download the archive to any folder
  2. Pull out the folder "ussr_zsu_57_2" in the folder "UserSights" in the root folder of the game (if not, then create with the same name)
  3. Go to the game client
  4. Choose the right technique
  5. Go to "Options" - > "Main parameters" - > "Common Battle Settings" - > "Use alternative sight grid" - > Select

Schindibee's fictional sight for Flakpanzer I "Gepard"

#customsight #sight #fictional #gepard #flakpz_i

This is a fully fictional sight for the Gepard, somewhat inspired by some aircrafts gun sights. Featured are scales for the Anti-Air belts (right) as well as for the APDS ammo (right).

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder \War Thunder\.

2) Go to test Drive (reccommended anyway to try out the sights)...

3) Once in test drive, press Alt + F9 to reload sights...

4) Go to options, and under tank options select the desired sight variant

Disclaimer:

Hi, All,

Actually this is not only gun sights, also include all basic technic. However, all slides are in Chinese. just try your best to read images if you unable understand Chinese.

TPD sights pack for T-64A, T-72A, T-72B and T-72AV
- TPD-K1/TPD-K1M laser rangefinder sight upgraded with Polish made electronic SKO-1M "DRAWA" FCS
- TPD-K1/TPD-K1M laser rangefinder sight
- TPD-2-49 coincidence rangefinder sight for T-64A

Videos:
https://youtu.be/oXKeADdde_A
https://youtu.be/M4sla0i8w5I

Version 2021.07.27
- Compatible with 2.7.0.131
- Fixed font scale.
- OF-26 range spinner better following game ballistics also at long range.
- Set the FOV blocker further down so that range display is better visible.
- Moved rangefinder, sight setting and ...
Dotted sight for any purpose. Comes with a variant with range marks.

PLEASE NOTE: Gaijins is constantly changing magnification in m1 tank series. Sometimes it is3-10x OR 8-12x. I will add sights for all this variants as soon as possible to encounter this. Sorry for inconvenience. Now it works fine. Dunno for how long.

So, @SGTEAGLE and @OkamiSenpai was asking about this sight for #m1a1 #m1a1_abrams
Instead of just one sight i created 3 of them in 4 variations each! You can choose between:
3x zoom HFOM for both rounds,
3x zoom without HFOM for both rounds,
3x zoom HFOM with historical layout for both rounds (crosshair lighting not recommended),
10x zoom HFOM f

#Sight
#toptier
#leopard2

Simple and clear Sight that I made for myself some time ago. No fancy vertical lines, no useless information, just 1/2/3 kilometer lines with 200m notches.

Two aditional notches below 3km are 4/5km, sometimes useful against Helicopters.

Used mainly on Leopards 2, but should work well on any other tank.
